definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

pinyin: qiu2 xin1 shi4 ji1 rou4 wei1 suo1 zheng4

sentences.english: Engage your core muscles, then curl your upper body towards a sitting position.
sentences.chinese: 调动人体核心部位的肌肉力量向上抬体，成坐姿。

sentences.english: You work on your muscle groups in a certain order.
sentences.chinese: 对各个肌肉群，你是在按照一个特定的顺序进行。

sentences.english: Most muscle and spinal injuries are from overstrain .
sentences.chinese: 大多数肌肉损伤和脊椎的问题都来自用力过度。

sentences.english: This approach created for the treatment of induration after intramuscular injection is also very effective.
sentences.chinese: 用于创建硬化治疗后，这种做法肌肉注射也很有效。

sentences.english: Purpose To study limb immobilization influencing on denervated muscle atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 结论肢体制动加速了失神经支配肌肉萎缩的发展。

sentences.english: Common side effects from these drugs include muscle pain and soreness.
sentences.chinese: 这些药物常见的副作用包括肌肉疼痛和酸痛。

sentences.english: Alleviate various muscles to ache and muscle spasm.
sentences.chinese: 缓解各种肌肉酸痛及肌肉痉挛。

sentences.english: Alleviate various muscles to ache and muscle spasm.
sentences.chinese: 缓解各种肌肉酸痛及肌肉痉挛。

sentences.english: The virus triggered myocarditis, a serious inflammation of the heart muscle.
sentences.chinese: 这些病毒引发心肌炎，对心脏肌肉造成严重的炎症。

sentences.english: The taste is healthy, the vitality is abundant, then the muscle is plentiful, the body is strong.
sentences.chinese: 脾胃健，气血盛，则肌肉丰腴，肢体强劲。

sentences.english: He hesitated and added, the muscles of his face contracting whitely.
sentences.chinese: 他一脸的肌肉在皱缩发白，一面吞吞吐吐地接下去说。

sentences.english: To bend the arm at the elbow, the muscle at the front of the upper arm has to shorten and bunch up.
sentences.chinese: 要从肘部弯曲手臂，就要收缩上臂正面的肌肉。

sentences.english: The present study demonstrated that neuromuscular monitoring improved endotracheal intubating conditions.
sentences.chinese: 本研究显示神经肌肉监测可改善插管条件。

sentences.english: Hyoid bone and arytenoid cartilages were resected and cricoid cartilage anastomosis with the base of the tongue and submental muscles.
sentences.chinese: 常规切除舌骨将环状软骨与舌根及颏下肌肉吻合。

sentences.english: Press your thumb to the muscle from the top of haunch outside with the same method as above.
sentences.chinese: 用同样的手法，从臀部顶向外侧把拇指压进肌肉。

sentences.english: In the experimental group, zinc sulfate was given intramuscularly each day, beginning 2 days before operation.
sentences.chinese: 供锌组于手术前2天起经肌肉供给硫酸锌。

definition: pectoralis major muscle (across the top of the chest)
latissimus dorsi muscle (back of the chest)
triceps brachii (back of the upper arm)
